author: Staff Reporter
text:
Organs retrieved from a 53-year-old brain dead person saved five persons. It is learnt that James, a businessman from Palakkad, met with an accident at Palakkad on January 1 and suffered a head injury.

He was admitted to Kovai Medical Centre Hospital, where he did not respond to treatment.

On Saturday, he was declared as brain dead.

His son Bijumon and relatives came forward to donate his vital organs, following which a team of doctors from the hospital and the Coimbatore Medical College Hospital retrieved his kidneys, liver and eyes on Sunday morning. The liver and a kidney were used for a transplant at the hospital.

The other kidney was sent to KG Hospital and both eyes to Sankara Eye Hospital.
title: Brain dead man saves five lives
